thread.title: Man Strangled to Death in Upper West Side Home, NYPD Says
thread.title_full: Man Strangled to Death in Upper West Side Home, NYPD Says

title: Man Strangled to Death in Upper West Side Home, NYPD Says
text:
View Full Caption DNAinfo/Trevor Kapp 
UPPER WEST SIDE â€” A man was found strangled to death in his Upper West Side apartment Wednesday morning, NYPD officials said. 
Zabary Savyon, 54, was discovered dead in his home at 155 W. 81st St., near Columbus Avenue, about 10:30 a.m., police said. 
He was pronounced dead at the scene, police said. 
There were no immediate arrests and the circumstances of Savyon's death weren't immediately clear.
